bio: UX Designer with a passion for creating user-centered designs. With experience and expertise in user research and prototyping, I strive to improve the overall user experience with every project.
aboutProjects: A selection of projects that demonstrate my skills and experience. My goal is to create user-centered designs that are both beautiful and functional.
aboutContact: Feel free to reach me out
aboutMe: I am a passionate UI/UX designer with a strong focus on user-centered design. I have a proven track record of creating user-friendly and visually appealing designs that meet the needs of users and businesses. I am also an experienced researcher and usability tester, and I am always looking for new ways to improve the user experience.
aboutExperience: A selection of relevant professional experience.

experience.brief: Led the design of a new digital product from ideation to launch and also conducted user research and usability testing to ensure that the product met user needs.
Designed user interfaces for a new digital products, creating wireframes and prototypes to test the designs with users.
Created wireframes and prototypes to test the design with users, working with developers to implement the design.
Designed user experience for digital products, defining the user journey and creating user flows.
